snippet: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova will play for the No. 1 ranking and the Madrid Open title after winning semifinals Saturday.
abstract: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova will play for No. 1 ranking and Madrid Open title after winning their semifinals; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova will play for the No. 1 ranking and the Madrid Open title after winning semifinals Saturday.

headline.seo: To the Winner of the Madrid Open, the No. 1 Ranking
